---
name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: ''
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
Describe what should have happened instead. This question can be skipped if the expected result is obvious.

**Expected result (optional)**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Frequency**
Does this bug appear consistently? If you can reproduce it, can you do so consistently? Does the bug only happen sometimes?

**Contact method**
Discord username, email, etc.

**Attachments (optional)**
Upload any supporting screenshots/videos.
